ai-iti5:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti5:2.4_0: Disdain is the one thing. Give it up,
ai-iti5:2.6_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti5:3.2_0: beings go to a bad place.
ai-iti5:3.6_0: they never return to this world.”
ai-iti5:4.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
